title: Startups as a Band / Startups as a Service

quotes.quote: Startups are hard and you can’t do it alone.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: A little chaos can channel your creative energy to great things.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: What if your latest startup had access to: A thoughtfully-priced plan with the Business/Enterprise features for your small (but hopefully growing) team.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: Because a startup is about 'starting'. If you are a 5 year old startup didn’t you start already? You’re scaling now.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

author: David Thyresson
